page.title: 11 INFORMATION SYSTEMS
page.content: In our area all the usual methods of sending a message are available. There is a Post Office in Frampton Mansell and one in Sapperton. There is a Post Box in Far Oakridge. The mail is collected twice each day, once in the morning and once in the afternoon from the Post Offices and Boxes.Most houses have a telephone and there is a Public Telephone Box in Frampton Mansell. There are two other methods of informing villagers of local events and interesting bits of news.Posters can be displayed in Bus Shelters and in the shop and on Notice Boards near the Church gate.There is a Newsheet for the villagers of Frampton Mansell and Sapperton and in Far Oakridge there is a magazine called What's On which is produced by three volunteers.But most news is passed on when people chat to each other!
